thread.section_title: The Knickerbocker - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: staff should be more professional
thread.title_full: staff should be more professional - Review of The Knickerbocker, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: lordeben
title: staff should be more professional
text: clean but absolutely no charm. The room looks like a hospital room. The roof bar is very nice but unfortunately the Wifi does not reach it. In the restaurant the staff was cold and unpleasant as well. At check in the staff was just totally inefficient and misleading.
